_source.title: lithium_sr3_rpc_sb_active_scalability_mtcbench_descr_viz
_source.visState:
{"title":"lithium_sr3_rpc_sb_active_scalability_mtcbench_descr_viz","type":"markdown","params":{"markdown":"## Lithium SR3 "RPC" mode, Active Switch Scalability with MT-Cbench
- controller: ODL Lithium SR3, drop-test "RPC" mode
- generator: MT-Cbench, "Latency" mode
- generator switches per thread: 50
- generator threads: [1,2,4,8,16,20,40,60,80,100]
- total topology size: [50, 100, 200,
400, 800, 1000, 2000, 3000, 4000, 5000]
- generator inter-thread creation delay: 15s
- traffic generation interval: 20s
- persistence: enabled"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}
